mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_reviews (id, user_id, order_id, product_id, score, content, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{score}, #{content}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_reviews WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT r.*, u.name as userName FROM tb_reviews r LEFT JOIN tb_users u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM tb_reviews WHERE order_id = #{orderId} LIMIT 1
